official_title: A bill to make certain repairs on a bridge on Interstate Route 95 in Greenwich, Connecticut, eligible for emergency relief under title 23, United States Code.

summary.text: Makes a project for the repair of the bridge on Interstate 95 which crosses the Mianus River in Greenwich, Connecticut, eligible for emergency relief.

titles.title: A bill to make certain repairs on a bridge on Interstate Route 95 in Greenwich, Connecticut, eligible for emergency relief under title 23, United States Code.
